Generated Narrative: ValueSet v3-ContextControlPropagating

Language: en

This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes fromhttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ContextControl where concept is-a _ContextControlPropagating

This value set excludes codes based on the following rules:

  • Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ContextControl
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    _ContextControlPropagatingContextControlPropagatingThe association propagates to any child Acts that are related via a conducting ActRelationship (refer to contextConductionInd).

name: ContextControlPropagating
title: ContextControlPropagating
description: The association propagates to any child Acts that are related via a conducting ActRelationship (refer to contextConductionInd).
